https://tmrev.io/movie/922495-BanG Dream! Poppin'Dream! 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/lDmjgzXX2E5uAtVqOkviU5pwdwV.jpg Poppin'Party, Roselia, and RAISE A SUILEN's successful concert at the Budokan has passed. Kasumi and the others, who have left a lingering sound on the stage of their dreams, are approached by a mysterious woman. Their next stage is overseas?! Poppin'Party's music isn't stopping yet! BanG Dream! Poppin'Dream!
